name: Seats Sacred and Secular
description:
When in Arkhe: Pneuma or Arkhe: Ousia states, switch Furina's state.
If you have Salon Members or Singer of Many Waters on the field, change their state as well.
descriptionraw: When in {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Pneuma or {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Ousia states, switch $[A1211]'s state.\nIf you have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1031]</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1032]</color> on the field, change their state as well.
descriptionreplaced: When in {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Pneuma or {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Ousia states, switch Furina's state.\nIf you have <color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Salon Members</color></color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Singer of Many Waters</color></color> on the field, change their state as well.
